name: Doki-Doki Delivery!
description:
Let the dice decide how you delivered the package door to door ! But, be careful what will you get after delivering one!

Controls:

-Arrow Key for movement

- Z for Iinteract

This game was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam which had the theme “Roll of the Dice”. This theme is integrated in several ways:

We used a number that the dice rolled to determine the number of package that needs to delivered to each door. and on top of that, the player will get nerfed/buffed after delivering one package, therefore causing more randomness and possibilities, interpreting how a dice works. as the game goes on, there will be more dice to be rolled causing more package needs to be delivered, and also buff/nerf to have a stronger impact.
